resources.string:
This application requires a connection to the ClubCom Network to function fully. 
 Connecting to a regular network will allow limited functionality. 
 If you are in range of a ClubCom network you can connect by clicking on its name below. 
 If you wish to use the app in its limited mode please connect to the internet through the device settings.
You must complete your account information to participate in contests.
Congratulations! You have been entered in this contest. You will receive an email shortly confirming the contest details. You can opt-in to receive further emails from the contest holder.
There was an error communicating with the server. Please, try again later.
An account with the entered username was not found. You may register for a new account or try again.
You must send an email or username (phone number) for authentication
An email was sent to %1$s. Please, retrieve your new password and log in.
An unknown error occurred while trying to create your profile. Please try again later.
This feature is only available when the server is connected. Please try again later.
Account Configuration files are missing. Please try again later.
You must be connected to the ClubCom Network to use this application.
The attempt to connect automatically failed. Please connect manually.
